description: Glossy Abelia (Abelia grandiflora 'Panache' SILVER ANNIVERSARY) is an amazing plant species. It has lush, deep green foliage with silver undersides that creates an eye-catching effect year-round. During summer, it blooms beautiful clusters of fragrant white and pink flowers. This award-winning variety of Abelia Grandiflora is incredibly versatile, and can be grown as a shrub or a specimen. It's drought-tolerant and can even been grown in containers. It's a low maintenance plant and the perfect addition to any garden.
